title: How to unsubscribe from Megogo: step-by-step instructions
description: Learn how to quickly cancel your Megogo subscription and stop debiting your card.
steps: Open the megogo.net website and log in to your profile.
Click on the profile icon in the upper right corner.
Find your active subscription and click the 'Manage' button.
Confirm the action in the window that appears.
seo_text: Cancelling your Megogo subscription allows you to save your money if you no longer plan to use the service. Remember that access to content is usually retained until the end of the already paid period.
